sentences.en: ‘Do you want to go out or just rent a movie?’ ‘I’m not fussy’ (= I don’t mind ) .
sentences.cn: “你想出去还是租影碟来看？”“随便。”

sentences.en: ‘How long are you staying？’ ‘I'm not fussy.’.
A lot of small children are fussy eaters (= they dislike many types of food ) .
He is fussy about the way his food's cooked.
sentences.cn: 他过分计较食物的烹调.

sentences.en: He's not fussy who he rents his room to.
sentences.cn: 他对于把房子租给谁并不讲究.

sentences.en: Her aunt was small, with a rather fussy manner.
sentences.cn: 她的姨妈个子矮小，为人相当挑剔。

sentences.en: His insistence upon precision of language is apt to seem fussy.
sentences.cn: 他斤斤计较文字的精确性,有时到了小题大作的程度.

sentences.en: I can get down to nitpicking detail, I am pretty fussy about certain things.
sentences.cn: 我会挑剔细节，我对某些事情相当吹毛求疵。

sentences.en: I've never been a fussy eater.
Jennifer Hart was a fussy, middle - class woman.
sentences.cn: 詹尼弗·哈特是个喜欢无事自扰的 中产阶级 妇女.

sentences.en: Our teacher is very fussy about punctuation.
sentences.cn: 我们老师对标点符号十分挑剔。

sentences.en: She is not fussy about her food.
She used to be so fussy about her appearance.
sentences.cn: 她过去非常在意自己的容貌。
有些女孩喜欢讲究的衣服.

sentences.en: The little black dress is the anithesis of fussy dressing.
sentences.cn: 与花哨的打扮形成鲜明对比的是这件小黑裙子。

sentences.en: The little girl dislikes her fussy parents.
sentences.cn: 小女孩讨厌她那过分操心的父母.

sentences.en: This attitude seemed to me unduly fussy.
sentences.cn: 在我看来这种态度过于大惊小怪.

sentences.en: We are not very keen on floral patterns and fussy designs.
sentences.cn: 我们不是很喜欢花卉图案和过于繁琐的设计。

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)随便（用于指某人对某事不介意，尤指即将做出的决定）

trans.tran_cn: 大惊小怪的，难取悦的，易烦恼的，（衣着，字句等上）充分讲究的
trans.tran_en: very concerned about small, usually unimportant details, and difficult to please
